section.title: CMakeCXXCompilerId.cpp
section.programlisting: 00001 /* This source file must have a .cpp extension so that all C++ compilers 00002 recognize the extension without flags. Borland does not know .cxx for 00003 example. */ 00004 #ifndef __cplusplus 00005 # error "A C compiler has been selected for C++." 00006 #endif 00007 00008 00009 /* Version number components: V=Version, R=Revision, P=Patch 00010 Version date components: YYYY=Year, MM=Month, DD=Day */ 00011 00012 #if defined(__COMO__) 00013 # define COMPILER_ID "Comeau" 00014 /* __COMO_VERSION__ = VRR */ 00015 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__COMO_VERSION__ / 100) 00016 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__COMO_VERSION__ % 100) 00017 00018 #elif defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) || defined(__ICC) 00019 # define COMPILER_ID "Intel" 00020 # if defined(_MSC_VER) 00021 # define SIMULATE_ID "MSVC" 00022 # endif 00023 # if defined(__GNUC__) 00024 # define SIMULATE_ID "GNU" 00025 # endif 00026 /* __INTEL_COMPILER = VRP prior to 2021, and then VVVV for 2021 and later, 00027 except that a few beta releases use the old format with V=2021. */ 00028 # if __INTEL_COMPILER < 2021 || __INTEL_COMPILER == 202110 || __INTEL_COMPILER == 202111 00029 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__INTEL_COMPILER/100) 00030 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__INTEL_COMPILER/10 % 10) 00031 # if defined(__INTEL_COMPILER_UPDATE) 00032 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__INTEL_COMPILER_UPDATE) 00033 # else 00034 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__INTEL_COMPILER % 10) 00035 # endif 00036 # else 00037 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__INTEL_COMPILER) 00038 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__INTEL_COMPILER_UPDATE) 00039 /* The third version component from --version is an update index, 00040 but no macro is provided for it. */ 00041 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(0) 00042 # endif 00043 # if defined(__INTEL_COMPILER_BUILD_DATE) 00044 /* __INTEL_COMPILER_BUILD_DATE = YYYYMMDD */ 00045 # define COMPILER_VERSION_TWEAK DEC(__INTEL_COMPILER_BUILD_DATE) 00046 # endif 00047 # if defined(_MSC_VER) 00048 /* _MSC_VER = VVRR */ 00049 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(_MSC_VER / 100) 00050 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR DEC(_MSC_VER % 100) 00051 # endif 00052 # if defined(__GNUC__) 00053 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__GNUC__) 00054 # elif defined(__GNUG__) 00055 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__GNUG__) 00056 # endif 00057 # if defined(__GNUC_MINOR__) 00058 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__GNUC_MINOR__) 00059 # endif 00060 # if defined(__GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00061 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00062 # endif 00063 00064 #elif (defined(__clang__) && defined(__INTEL_CLANG_COMPILER)) || defined(__INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER) 00065 # define COMPILER_ID "IntelLLVM" 00066 #if defined(_MSC_VER) 00067 # define SIMULATE_ID "MSVC" 00068 #endif 00069 #if defined(__GNUC__) 00070 # define SIMULATE_ID "GNU" 00071 #endif 00072 /* __INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER = VVVVRP prior to 2021.2.0, VVVVRRPP for 2021.2.0 and 00073 * later. Look for 6 digit vs. 8 digit version number to decide encoding. 00074 * VVVV is no smaller than the current year when a versio is released. 00075 */ 00076 #if __INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER < 1000000L 00077 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER/100) 00078 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER/10 % 10) 00079 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER % 10) 00080 #else 00081 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER/10000) 00082 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER/100 % 100) 00083 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__INTEL_LLVM_COMPILER % 100) 00084 #endif 00085 #if defined(_MSC_VER) 00086 /* _MSC_VER = VVRR */ 00087 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(_MSC_VER / 100) 00088 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR DEC(_MSC_VER % 100) 00089 #endif 00090 #if defined(__GNUC__) 00091 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__GNUC__) 00092 #elif defined(__GNUG__) 00093 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__GNUG__) 00094 #endif 00095 #if defined(__GNUC_MINOR__) 00096 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__GNUC_MINOR__) 00097 #endif 00098 #if defined(__GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00099 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00100 #endif 00101 00102 #elif defined(__PATHCC__) 00103 # define COMPILER_ID "PathScale" 00104 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__PATHCC__) 00105 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__PATHCC_MINOR__) 00106 # if defined(__PATHCC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00107 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__PATHCC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00108 # endif 00109 00110 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__) && defined(__CODEGEARC_VERSION__) 00111 # define COMPILER_ID "Embarcadero" 00112 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR HEX(__CODEGEARC_VERSION__>>24 & 0x00FF) 00113 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR HEX(__CODEGEARC_VERSION__>>16 & 0x00FF) 00114 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__CODEGEARC_VERSION__ & 0xFFFF) 00115 00116 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__) 00117 # define COMPILER_ID "Borland" 00118 /* __BORLANDC__ = 0xVRR */ 00119 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR HEX(__BORLANDC__>>8) 00120 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR HEX(__BORLANDC__ & 0xFF) 00121 00122 #elif defined(__WATCOMC__) && __WATCOMC__ < 1200 00123 # define COMPILER_ID "Watcom" 00124 /* __WATCOMC__ = VVRR */ 00125 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__WATCOMC__ / 100) 00126 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC((__WATCOMC__ / 10) % 10) 00127 # if (__WATCOMC__ % 10) > 0 00128 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__WATCOMC__ % 10) 00129 # endif 00130 00131 #elif defined(__WATCOMC__) 00132 # define COMPILER_ID "OpenWatcom" 00133 /* __WATCOMC__ = VVRP + 1100 */ 00134 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC((__WATCOMC__ - 1100) / 100) 00135 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC((__WATCOMC__ / 10) % 10) 00136 # if (__WATCOMC__ % 10) > 0 00137 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__WATCOMC__ % 10) 00138 # endif 00139 00140 #elif defined(__SUNPRO_CC) 00141 # define COMPILER_ID "SunPro" 00142 # if __SUNPRO_CC >= 0x5100 00143 /* __SUNPRO_CC = 0xVRRP */ 00144 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR HEX(__SUNPRO_CC>>12) 00145 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR HEX(__SUNPRO_CC>>4 & 0xFF) 00146 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH HEX(__SUNPRO_CC & 0xF) 00147 # else 00148 /* __SUNPRO_CC = 0xVRP */ 00149 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR HEX(__SUNPRO_CC>>8) 00150 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR HEX(__SUNPRO_CC>>4 & 0xF) 00151 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH HEX(__SUNPRO_CC & 0xF) 00152 # endif 00153 00154 #elif defined(__HP_aCC) 00155 # define COMPILER_ID "HP" 00156 /* __HP_aCC = VVRRPP */ 00157 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__HP_aCC/10000) 00158 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__HP_aCC/100 % 100) 00159 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__HP_aCC % 100) 00160 00161 #elif defined(__DECCXX) 00162 # define COMPILER_ID "Compaq" 00163 /* __DECCXX_VER = VVRRTPPPP */ 00164 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__DECCXX_VER/10000000) 00165 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__DECCXX_VER/100000 % 100) 00166 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__DECCXX_VER % 10000) 00167 00168 #elif defined(__IBMCPP__) && defined(__COMPILER_VER__) 00169 # define COMPILER_ID "zOS" 00170 /* __IBMCPP__ = VRP */ 00171 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__IBMCPP__/100) 00172 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__IBMCPP__/10 % 10) 00173 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__IBMCPP__ % 10) 00174 00175 #elif defined(__ibmxl__) && defined(__clang__) 00176 # define COMPILER_ID "XLClang" 00177 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__ibmxl_version__) 00178 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__ibmxl_release__) 00179 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__ibmxl_modification__) 00180 # define COMPILER_VERSION_TWEAK DEC(__ibmxl_ptf_fix_level__) 00181 00182 00183 #elif defined(__IBMCPP__) && !defined(__COMPILER_VER__) && __IBMCPP__ >= 800 00184 # define COMPILER_ID "XL" 00185 /* __IBMCPP__ = VRP */ 00186 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__IBMCPP__/100) 00187 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__IBMCPP__/10 % 10) 00188 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__IBMCPP__ % 10) 00189 00190 #elif defined(__IBMCPP__) && !defined(__COMPILER_VER__) && __IBMCPP__ < 800 00191 # define COMPILER_ID "VisualAge" 00192 /* __IBMCPP__ = VRP */ 00193 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__IBMCPP__/100) 00194 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__IBMCPP__/10 % 10) 00195 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__IBMCPP__ % 10) 00196 00197 #elif defined(__NVCOMPILER) 00198 # define COMPILER_ID "NVHPC" 00199 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__NVCOMPILER_MAJOR__) 00200 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__NVCOMPILER_MINOR__) 00201 # if defined(__NVCOMPILER_PATCHLEVEL__) 00202 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__NVCOMPILER_PATCHLEVEL__) 00203 # endif 00204 00205 #elif defined(__PGI) 00206 # define COMPILER_ID "PGI" 00207 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__PGIC__) 00208 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__PGIC_MINOR__) 00209 # if defined(__PGIC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00210 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__PGIC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00211 # endif 00212 00213 #elif defined(_CRAYC) 00214 # define COMPILER_ID "Cray" 00215 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(_RELEASE_MAJOR) 00216 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(_RELEASE_MINOR) 00217 00218 #elif defined(__TI_COMPILER_VERSION__) 00219 # define COMPILER_ID "TI" 00220 /* __TI_COMPILER_VERSION__ = VVVRRRPPP */ 00221 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__TI_COMPILER_VERSION__/1000000) 00222 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__TI_COMPILER_VERSION__/1000 % 1000) 00223 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__TI_COMPILER_VERSION__ % 1000) 00224 00225 #elif defined(__FUJITSU) || defined(__FCC_VERSION) || defined(__fcc_version) 00226 # define COMPILER_ID "Fujitsu" 00227 00228 #elif defined(__ghs__) 00229 # define COMPILER_ID "GHS" 00230 /* __GHS_VERSION_NUMBER = VVVVRP */ 00231 # ifdef __GHS_VERSION_NUMBER 00232 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__GHS_VERSION_NUMBER / 100) 00233 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__GHS_VERSION_NUMBER / 10 % 10) 00234 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__GHS_VERSION_NUMBER % 10) 00235 # endif 00236 00237 #elif defined(__SCO_VERSION__) 00238 # define COMPILER_ID "SCO" 00239 00240 #elif defined(__ARMCC_VERSION) && !defined(__clang__) 00241 # define COMPILER_ID "ARMCC" 00242 #if __ARMCC_VERSION >= 1000000 00243 /* __ARMCC_VERSION = VRRPPPP */ 00244 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__ARMCC_VERSION/1000000) 00245 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__ARMCC_VERSION/10000 % 100) 00246 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__ARMCC_VERSION % 10000) 00247 #else 00248 /* __ARMCC_VERSION = VRPPPP */ 00249 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__ARMCC_VERSION/100000) 00250 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__ARMCC_VERSION/10000 % 10) 00251 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__ARMCC_VERSION % 10000) 00252 #endif 00253 00254 00255 #elif defined(__clang__) && defined(__apple_build_version__) 00256 # define COMPILER_ID "AppleClang" 00257 # if defined(_MSC_VER) 00258 # define SIMULATE_ID "MSVC" 00259 # endif 00260 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__clang_major__) 00261 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__clang_minor__) 00262 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__clang_patchlevel__) 00263 # if defined(_MSC_VER) 00264 /* _MSC_VER = VVRR */ 00265 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(_MSC_VER / 100) 00266 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR DEC(_MSC_VER % 100) 00267 # endif 00268 # define COMPILER_VERSION_TWEAK DEC(__apple_build_version__) 00269 00270 #elif defined(__clang__) && defined(__ARMCOMPILER_VERSION) 00271 # define COMPILER_ID "ARMClang" 00272 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__ARMCOMPILER_VERSION/1000000) 00273 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__ARMCOMPILER_VERSION/10000 % 100) 00274 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__ARMCOMPILER_VERSION % 10000) 00275 # define COMPILER_VERSION_INTERNAL DEC(__ARMCOMPILER_VERSION) 00276 00277 #elif defined(__clang__) 00278 # define COMPILER_ID "Clang" 00279 # if defined(_MSC_VER) 00280 # define SIMULATE_ID "MSVC" 00281 # endif 00282 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__clang_major__) 00283 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__clang_minor__) 00284 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__clang_patchlevel__) 00285 # if defined(_MSC_VER) 00286 /* _MSC_VER = VVRR */ 00287 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(_MSC_VER / 100) 00288 # define SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR DEC(_MSC_VER % 100) 00289 # endif 00290 00291 #elif defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__GNUG__) 00292 # define COMPILER_ID "GNU" 00293 # if defined(__GNUC__) 00294 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__GNUC__) 00295 # else 00296 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(__GNUG__) 00297 # endif 00298 # if defined(__GNUC_MINOR__) 00299 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(__GNUC_MINOR__) 00300 # endif 00301 # if defined(__GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00302 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__) 00303 # endif 00304 00305 #elif defined(_MSC_VER) 00306 # define COMPILER_ID "MSVC" 00307 /* _MSC_VER = VVRR */ 00308 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC(_MSC_VER / 100) 00309 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(_MSC_VER % 100) 00310 # if defined(_MSC_FULL_VER) 00311 # if _MSC_VER >= 1400 00312 /* _MSC_FULL_VER = VVRRPPPPP */ 00313 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(_MSC_FULL_VER % 100000) 00314 # else 00315 /* _MSC_FULL_VER = VVRRPPPP */ 00316 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(_MSC_FULL_VER % 10000) 00317 # endif 00318 # endif 00319 # if defined(_MSC_BUILD) 00320 # define COMPILER_VERSION_TWEAK DEC(_MSC_BUILD) 00321 # endif 00322 00323 #elif defined(__VISUALDSPVERSION__) || defined(__ADSPBLACKFIN__) || defined(__ADSPTS__) || defined(__ADSP21000__) 00324 # define COMPILER_ID "ADSP" 00325 #if defined(__VISUALDSPVERSION__) 00326 /* __VISUALDSPVERSION__ = 0xVVRRPP00 */ 00327 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR HEX(__VISUALDSPVERSION__>>24) 00328 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR HEX(__VISUALDSPVERSION__>>16 & 0xFF) 00329 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH HEX(__VISUALDSPVERSION__>>8 & 0xFF) 00330 #endif 00331 00332 #elif defined(__IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__) || defined(__IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC) 00333 # define COMPILER_ID "IAR" 00334 # if defined(__VER__) && defined(__ICCARM__) 00335 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC((__VER__) / 1000000) 00336 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC(((__VER__) / 1000) % 1000) 00337 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC((__VER__) % 1000) 00338 # define COMPILER_VERSION_INTERNAL DEC(__IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__) 00339 # elif defined(__VER__) && (defined(__ICCAVR__) || defined(__ICCRX__) || defined(__ICCRH850__) || defined(__ICCRL78__) || defined(__ICC430__) || defined(__ICCRISCV__) || defined(__ICCV850__) || defined(__ICC8051__) || defined(__ICCSTM8__)) 00340 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR DEC((__VER__) / 100) 00341 # define COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR DEC((__VER__) - (((__VER__) / 100)*100)) 00342 # define COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH DEC(__SUBVERSION__) 00343 # define COMPILER_VERSION_INTERNAL DEC(__IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__) 00344 # endif 00345 00346 00347 /* These compilers are either not known or too old to define an 00348 identification macro. Try to identify the platform and guess that 00349 it is the native compiler. */ 00350 #elif defined(__hpux) || defined(__hpua) 00351 # define COMPILER_ID "HP" 00352 00353 #else /* unknown compiler */ 00354 # define COMPILER_ID "" 00355 #endif 00356 00357 /* Construct the string literal in pieces to prevent the source from 00358 getting matched. Store it in a pointer rather than an array 00359 because some compilers will just produce instructions to fill the 00360 array rather than assigning a pointer to a static array. */ 00361 char const* info_compiler = "INFO" ":" "compiler[" COMPILER_ID "]"; 00362 #ifdef SIMULATE_ID 00363 char const* info_simulate = "INFO" ":" "simulate[" SIMULATE_ID "]"; 00364 #endif 00365 00366 #ifdef __QNXNTO__ 00367 char const* qnxnto = "INFO" ":" "qnxnto[]"; 00368 #endif 00369 00370 #if defined(__CRAYXT_COMPUTE_LINUX_TARGET) 00371 char const *info_cray = "INFO" ":" "compiler_wrapper[CrayPrgEnv]"; 00372 #endif 00373 00374 #define STRINGIFY_HELPER(X) #X 00375 #define STRINGIFY(X) STRINGIFY_HELPER(X) 00376 00377 /* Identify known platforms by name. */ 00378 #if defined(__linux) || defined(__linux__) || defined(linux) 00379 # define PLATFORM_ID "Linux" 00380 00381 #elif defined(__CYGWIN__) 00382 # define PLATFORM_ID "Cygwin" 00383 00384 #elif defined(__MINGW32__) 00385 # define PLATFORM_ID "MinGW" 00386 00387 #elif defined(__APPLE__) 00388 # define PLATFORM_ID "Darwin" 00389 00390 #elif defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(WIN32) 00391 # define PLATFORM_ID "Windows" 00392 00393 #elif defined(__FreeBSD__) || defined(__FreeBSD) 00394 # define PLATFORM_ID "FreeBSD" 00395 00396 #elif defined(__NetBSD__) || defined(__NetBSD) 00397 # define PLATFORM_ID "NetBSD" 00398 00399 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__) || defined(__OPENBSD) 00400 # define PLATFORM_ID "OpenBSD" 00401 00402 #elif defined(__sun) || defined(sun) 00403 # define PLATFORM_ID "SunOS" 00404 00405 #elif defined(_AIX) || defined(__AIX) || defined(__AIX__) || defined(__aix) || defined(__aix__) 00406 # define PLATFORM_ID "AIX" 00407 00408 #elif defined(__hpux) || defined(__hpux__) 00409 # define PLATFORM_ID "HP-UX" 00410 00411 #elif defined(__HAIKU__) 00412 # define PLATFORM_ID "Haiku" 00413 00414 #elif defined(__BeOS) || defined(__BEOS__) || defined(_BEOS) 00415 # define PLATFORM_ID "BeOS" 00416 00417 #elif defined(__QNX__) || defined(__QNXNTO__) 00418 # define PLATFORM_ID "QNX" 00419 00420 #elif defined(__tru64) || defined(_tru64) || defined(__TRU64__) 00421 # define PLATFORM_ID "Tru64" 00422 00423 #elif defined(__riscos) || defined(__riscos__) 00424 # define PLATFORM_ID "RISCos" 00425 00426 #elif defined(__sinix) || defined(__sinix__) || defined(__SINIX__) 00427 # define PLATFORM_ID "SINIX" 00428 00429 #elif defined(__UNIX_SV__) 00430 # define PLATFORM_ID "UNIX_SV" 00431 00432 #elif defined(__bsdos__) 00433 # define PLATFORM_ID "BSDOS" 00434 00435 #elif defined(_MPRAS) || defined(MPRAS) 00436 # define PLATFORM_ID "MP-RAS" 00437 00438 #elif defined(__osf) || defined(__osf__) 00439 # define PLATFORM_ID "OSF1" 00440 00441 #elif defined(_SCO_SV) || defined(SCO_SV) || defined(sco_sv) 00442 # define PLATFORM_ID "SCO_SV" 00443 00444 #elif defined(__ultrix) || defined(__ultrix__) || defined(_ULTRIX) 00445 # define PLATFORM_ID "ULTRIX" 00446 00447 #elif defined(__XENIX__) || defined(_XENIX) || defined(XENIX) 00448 # define PLATFORM_ID "Xenix" 00449 00450 #elif defined(__WATCOMC__) 00451 # if defined(__LINUX__) 00452 # define PLATFORM_ID "Linux" 00453 00454 # elif defined(__DOS__) 00455 # define PLATFORM_ID "DOS" 00456 00457 # elif defined(__OS2__) 00458 # define PLATFORM_ID "OS2" 00459 00460 # elif defined(__WINDOWS__) 00461 # define PLATFORM_ID "Windows3x" 00462 00463 # elif defined(__VXWORKS__) 00464 # define PLATFORM_ID "VxWorks" 00465 00466 # else /* unknown platform */ 00467 # define PLATFORM_ID 00468 # endif 00469 00470 #elif defined(__INTEGRITY) 00471 # if defined(INT_178B) 00472 # define PLATFORM_ID "Integrity178" 00473 00474 # else /* regular Integrity */ 00475 # define PLATFORM_ID "Integrity" 00476 # endif 00477 00478 #else /* unknown platform */ 00479 # define PLATFORM_ID 00480 00481 #endif 00482 00483 /* For windows compilers MSVC and Intel we can determine 00484 the architecture of the compiler being used. This is because 00485 the compilers do not have flags that can change the architecture, 00486 but rather depend on which compiler is being used 00487 */ 00488 #if defined(_WIN32) && defined(_MSC_VER) 00489 # if defined(_M_IA64) 00490 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "IA64" 00491 00492 # elif defined(_M_ARM64EC) 00493 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARM64EC" 00494 00495 # elif defined(_M_X64) || defined(_M_AMD64) 00496 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "x64" 00497 00498 # elif defined(_M_IX86) 00499 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "X86" 00500 00501 # elif defined(_M_ARM64) 00502 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARM64" 00503 00504 # elif defined(_M_ARM) 00505 # if _M_ARM == 4 00506 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARMV4I" 00507 # elif _M_ARM == 5 00508 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARMV5I" 00509 # else 00510 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARMV" STRINGIFY(_M_ARM) 00511 # endif 00512 00513 # elif defined(_M_MIPS) 00514 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "MIPS" 00515 00516 # elif defined(_M_SH) 00517 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "SHx" 00518 00519 # else /* unknown architecture */ 00520 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "" 00521 # endif 00522 00523 #elif defined(__WATCOMC__) 00524 # if defined(_M_I86) 00525 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "I86" 00526 00527 # elif defined(_M_IX86) 00528 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "X86" 00529 00530 # else /* unknown architecture */ 00531 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "" 00532 # endif 00533 00534 #elif defined(__IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__) || defined(__IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC) 00535 # if defined(__ICCARM__) 00536 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARM" 00537 00538 # elif defined(__ICCRX__) 00539 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "RX" 00540 00541 # elif defined(__ICCRH850__) 00542 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "RH850" 00543 00544 # elif defined(__ICCRL78__) 00545 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "RL78" 00546 00547 # elif defined(__ICCRISCV__) 00548 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "RISCV" 00549 00550 # elif defined(__ICCAVR__) 00551 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "AVR" 00552 00553 # elif defined(__ICC430__) 00554 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "MSP430" 00555 00556 # elif defined(__ICCV850__) 00557 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "V850" 00558 00559 # elif defined(__ICC8051__) 00560 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "8051" 00561 00562 # elif defined(__ICCSTM8__) 00563 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "STM8" 00564 00565 # else /* unknown architecture */ 00566 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "" 00567 # endif 00568 00569 #elif defined(__ghs__) 00570 # if defined(__PPC64__) 00571 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "PPC64" 00572 00573 # elif defined(__ppc__) 00574 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "PPC" 00575 00576 # elif defined(__ARM__) 00577 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARM" 00578 00579 # elif defined(__x86_64__) 00580 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "x64" 00581 00582 # elif defined(__i386__) 00583 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "X86" 00584 00585 # else /* unknown architecture */ 00586 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "" 00587 # endif 00588 00589 #elif defined(__TI_COMPILER_VERSION__) 00590 # if defined(__TI_ARM__) 00591 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "ARM" 00592 00593 # elif defined(__MSP430__) 00594 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "MSP430" 00595 00596 # elif defined(__TMS320C28XX__) 00597 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "TMS320C28x" 00598 00599 # elif defined(__TMS320C6X__) || defined(_TMS320C6X) 00600 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "TMS320C6x" 00601 00602 # else /* unknown architecture */ 00603 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID "" 00604 # endif 00605 00606 #else 00607 # define ARCHITECTURE_ID 00608 #endif 00609 00610 /* Convert integer to decimal digit literals. */ 00611 #define DEC(n) \ 00612 ('0' + (((n) / 10000000)%10)), \ 00613 ('0' + (((n) / 1000000)%10)), \ 00614 ('0' + (((n) / 100000)%10)), \ 00615 ('0' + (((n) / 10000)%10)), \ 00616 ('0' + (((n) / 1000)%10)), \ 00617 ('0' + (((n) / 100)%10)), \ 00618 ('0' + (((n) / 10)%10)), \ 00619 ('0' + ((n) % 10)) 00620 00621 /* Convert integer to hex digit literals. */ 00622 #define HEX(n) \ 00623 ('0' + ((n)>>28 & 0xF)), \ 00624 ('0' + ((n)>>24 & 0xF)), \ 00625 ('0' + ((n)>>20 & 0xF)), \ 00626 ('0' + ((n)>>16 & 0xF)), \ 00627 ('0' + ((n)>>12 & 0xF)), \ 00628 ('0' + ((n)>>8 & 0xF)), \ 00629 ('0' + ((n)>>4 & 0xF)), \ 00630 ('0' + ((n) & 0xF)) 00631 00632 /* Construct a string literal encoding the version number components. */ 00633 #ifdef COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR 00634 char const info_version[] = { 00635 'I', 'N', 'F', 'O', ':', 00636 'c','o','m','p','i','l','e','r','_','v','e','r','s','i','o','n','[', 00637 COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR, 00638 # ifdef COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR 00639 '.', COMPILER_VERSION_MINOR, 00640 # ifdef COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH 00641 '.', COMPILER_VERSION_PATCH, 00642 # ifdef COMPILER_VERSION_TWEAK 00643 '.', COMPILER_VERSION_TWEAK, 00644 # endif 00645 # endif 00646 # endif 00647 ']','\0'}; 00648 #endif 00649 00650 /* Construct a string literal encoding the internal version number. */ 00651 #ifdef COMPILER_VERSION_INTERNAL 00652 char const info_version_internal[] = { 00653 'I', 'N', 'F', 'O', ':', 00654 'c','o','m','p','i','l','e','r','_','v','e','r','s','i','o','n','_', 00655 'i','n','t','e','r','n','a','l','[', 00656 COMPILER_VERSION_INTERNAL,']','\0'}; 00657 #endif 00658 00659 /* Construct a string literal encoding the version number components. */ 00660 #ifdef SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR 00661 char const info_simulate_version[] = { 00662 'I', 'N', 'F', 'O', ':', 00663 's','i','m','u','l','a','t','e','_','v','e','r','s','i','o','n','[', 00664 SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR, 00665 # ifdef SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR 00666 '.', SIMULATE_VERSION_MINOR, 00667 # ifdef SIMULATE_VERSION_PATCH 00668 '.', SIMULATE_VERSION_PATCH, 00669 # ifdef SIMULATE_VERSION_TWEAK 00670 '.', SIMULATE_VERSION_TWEAK, 00671 # endif 00672 # endif 00673 # endif 00674 ']','\0'}; 00675 #endif 00676 00677 /* Construct the string literal in pieces to prevent the source from 00678 getting matched. Store it in a pointer rather than an array 00679 because some compilers will just produce instructions to fill the 00680 array rather than assigning a pointer to a static array. */ 00681 char const* info_platform = "INFO" ":" "platform[" PLATFORM_ID "]"; 00682 char const* info_arch = "INFO" ":" "arch[" ARCHITECTURE_ID "]"; 00683 00684 00685 00686 #if defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) && defined(_MSVC_LANG) && _MSVC_LANG < 201403L 00687 # if defined(__INTEL_CXX11_MODE__) 00688 # if defined(__cpp_aggregate_nsdmi) 00689 # define CXX_STD 201402L 00690 # else 00691 # define CXX_STD 201103L 00692 # endif 00693 # else 00694 # define CXX_STD 199711L 00695 # endif 00696 #elif defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(_MSVC_LANG) 00697 # define CXX_STD _MSVC_LANG 00698 #else 00699 # define CXX_STD __cplusplus 00700 #endif 00701 00702 const char* info_language_dialect_default = "INFO" ":" "dialect_default[" 00703 #if CXX_STD > 202002L 00704 "23" 00705 #elif CXX_STD > 201703L 00706 "20" 00707 #elif CXX_STD >= 201703L 00708 "17" 00709 #elif CXX_STD >= 201402L 00710 "14" 00711 #elif CXX_STD >= 201103L 00712 "11" 00713 #else 00714 "98" 00715 #endif 00716 "]"; 00717 00718 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ 00719 00720 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) 00721 { 00722 int require = 0; 00723 require += info_compiler[argc]; 00724 require += info_platform[argc]; 00725 #ifdef COMPILER_VERSION_MAJOR 00726 require += info_version[argc]; 00727 #endif 00728 #ifdef COMPILER_VERSION_INTERNAL 00729 require += info_version_internal[argc]; 00730 #endif 00731 #ifdef SIMULATE_ID 00732 require += info_simulate[argc]; 00733 #endif 00734 #ifdef SIMULATE_VERSION_MAJOR 00735 require += info_simulate_version[argc]; 00736 #endif 00737 #if defined(__CRAYXT_COMPUTE_LINUX_TARGET) 00738 require += info_cray[argc]; 00739 #endif 00740 require += info_language_dialect_default[argc]; 00741 (void)argv; 00742 return require; 00743 }
